name: PanelDraw
short_description:
PanelDraw is an electrical panel drawing software  (primarily for compartmentalized Motor Control Centre) that automatically generates complete drawings set.

The user just enters the panel details, motor KW ratings etc. and following drawings are generated (in both PDF and AutoCAD compatible DXF format)
- Main System Details Cover Page
- List of Drawings
- Single Line Diagram
- Incomer Metering Drawing
- Starter-wise Control and Power circuits
- Termination Drawing
- Panel External GA
- Panel Internal GA
- Complete Bill of Material Detail

Multiple Incomers with bus couplers are supported. The generated External GA drawing can be modified in a highly user friendly manner through drag & drop interface.
